title: Warrior

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Station yourself at a player's house and fight against any attackers.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you station yourself at a player's house, you'll counterattack their visitors. Take the Attack value of each attack, and send it back at the attacker. If they die, their attack is nullified. If they survive, you'll still nullify the attack, but you yourself will die from the battle wounds.
- You may self-target if you dare.

desc:
Post 2517
_**Offense** is the best defense. Keep that in mind._
